tokens.token: the token (word) to train, given exactly as it appears in tokens
tokens.initializer: (optional) starting point for the embedding. make it close to the intended meaning to kick-start training. should be shorter (in tokens) than the vector_length.
tokens.initialize_random: (optional, default false) if true, initialize/overwrite any existing embedding with random.
tokens.vector_length: (optional, default 1) length of the embedding. use more if you have more images and/or if what you want to train is complex.

documentation.fallback_word: word that will be inserted at the head of a caption if there are no training tokens in that caption
documentation.example: the example below trains `hat*`, `dancing shoes` and `cane` as custom tokens, if you have training data where the captions include those tokens.
